legibleDescription.textElement: Well-known value. Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Modbus Map.

programmerHints.textElement: recommendation: use this field to identfy that this device's communication works well: readout 0x53756e53 ('SunS')

bitmapEntry.literal: Fixed voltage lower than current MPP voltage

legibleDescription.textElement: Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Multiple MPPT Inverter Extension Model Mode
